javadoc:
Generates a text label on each {@link CodeUnit} that marks the start of a memory block. The
  label will will appear as part of the PLATE group in the field map.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: model
params.comment: the model that the field belongs to.

params.name: fieldOptions
params.comment: the Options for field specific properties.

methods.javadoc:
Overridden to ensure that we return a {@link MemoryBlockStartFieldLocation} instance.
@see ghidra.app.util.viewer.field.FieldFactory#getProgramLocation(int, int, ghidra.app.util.viewer.field.ListingField)
methods.name: getProgramLocation
methods.comment: Overridden to ensure that we return a MemoryBlockStartFieldLocation instance.

methods.name: getFieldLocation
methods.comment:
Overridden to ensure that we only place block comments on the first CodeUnit of 
 the block.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a comment to be show at the beginning of each block that shows the following:
   - block name
   - block type
   - block start/end address (size)
   - block comment
@param cu
methods.name: createBlockStartText
methods.comment:
Creates a comment to be show at the beginning of each block that shows the following:
   - block name
   - block type
   - block start/end address (size)
   - block comment

methods.name: createFieldElements
methods.comment: Creates FieldElement instances for each given AttributedString.

methods.name: getLongestLineSize
methods.comment: Returns the length of the longest string in the given list.

name: MemoryBlockStartFieldFactory
comment:
Generates a text label on each CodeUnit that marks the start of a memory block. The
  label will will appear as part of the PLATE group in the field map.
